## Projects

**UrbanLoad: AI-Driven Electricity Demand Forecasting**
*2025*
- Built a full-stack ML web app to forecast urban electricity demand using LSTM and regression models.
- Integrated real-time weather data with secure dashboards (React.js, Clerk) and interactive load visualizations.
- Delivered sustainability insights (CO2 reduction, clean energy optimization) aligned with UN SDG #7.

**AI Resume Maker**
*2025*
- Developed an AI-based resume generator using Gemini API with LaTeX rendering.
- Implemented real-time preview and download feature as a web app.
- Designed multiple resume templates and automated ATS-friendly formatting.

**Fake News Detection with NLP**
*2024*
- Built a text classification pipeline to detect fake news using Logistic Regression.
- Applied NLP preprocessing (tokenization, TF-IDF), achieving high precision and recall.

**Student Performance Prediction**
*2024*
- Created regression models to predict student grades based on study hours, family background, and school engagement.
- Visualized patterns using Seaborn and improved model performance with grid search.
